title: Anyone interested in starting rank team Silver/Gold
body:
Anyone want to start a semi active rank team?
Im silver 2 Mid adc main
if anyone wants to join or start one comment here  or add us
Uhscotty

replies.body: Silver 4 but I could climb easy if I tried. Can play any role well but main top. I can play almost any champ asked of me top well damage or tank, I can play all roles well with at least 3 champs and have been looking for a ranked team for a little while. LeArN2pL4Y (Was banned from posting on here for some reason) I'm usually quite active when not playing basketball
im a gold 5 top and jungle main, really active and not too serious, just want to have fun

hey man,
check out my post

Hey.
I play Braum, Malzahar, Wukong and Quinn. 
Been trying to expand my roster for awhile now.

Unranked. I deem myself low Silver/High Bronze at the very very very least.
Hey Silve 2. Competent in all lanes, support my best mid my worst. Give me a look if you want a game
Hey yo, I'm bronze 4 :// so probably not an option but I'm quite active main support/jungle and would be keen to play as a 5 ranked team!
Hey im silver 4 willing to join, i'm fine with any role needed and im fairly active so if you want add me
